event.name: general
event.commentary: _P1_ feeds the ball through to _P0_
_P1_ threads a great ball to _P0_
Lovely pass from _P1_ releases _P0_
Long floating pass from _P1_ finds _P0_
Good passing move across the pitch and down the right
Quick passing move down the left
_P1_ cross controlled by _P0_ who slips past his man
Another decent move down the wing
_P0_ latches onto _P1_'s pass
_P1_ needles ball through players and finds _P0_
_P1_ controls it with his chest and passes to _P0_
_P1_ heads the ball towards _P0_
_P0_ twisting and turning again
_P0_ rips through the midfield
_P0_ spins past his marker

event.name: lost_possession
event.commentary: _P0_ wins the ball with a perfectly timed challenge
Bad control by _P1_ lets _P0_ steal the ball off him
_P0_ takes the ball away from _P1_ with a sliding tackle
Loose ball falls to _P0_

event.name: foul
event.commentary: Oww, nasty tackle on _P0_
Surely that's a sending off offence
_P1_ knocks over _P0_ with a double footed lunge
Crunching challenge on _P0_
_P0_ gets his legs taken away from him by _P1_
Slicing challenge by _P1_ on _P0_
Vicious tackle from _P1_ leaves _P0_ lying on the floor in agony
Ouch that's got to hurt
Extremely high boot from _P1_ sends _P0_ to the ground

event.name: scoring_chance
event.commentary: _P0_ charges towards goal and shoots!
_P0_ spins and shoots
Long ball from _P1_ finds _P0_ at far post
_P0_ can't quite get it under control but his miss kick heads toward goal
_P0_ shoots from 22 yards looks like it's going wide
_P0_ dribbles into the box, turns inside the defence and fires
_P0_ cuts in from the left flank and shoots
_P0_ tries his luck from 30 yards
_P0_ arrows shot towards top left corner
_P0_ shoots from close range
Great ball from _P1_ sends _P0_ one on one with the goalkeeper
_P0_'s overhead kick heads towards the top right hand corner
_P0_ spins past two defenders, wrong foots the keeper and back heels the ball towards goal
_P1_ lays the ball off to _P0_ who sends a rocket of a shot towards goal

event.name: goal
event.commentary: Goal!!!
And the ball is smacked into the back of the net!!!
_P0_ scores!!!
And the ball flies straight past _P1_ and into the back of the net!!!
The ball flies past _P1_ and it's a goal!!!
_P0_ wheels away in celebration after a great goal sent the fans wild
_P1_'s despairing dive can't keep _P0_'s shot out and the ball is in the back of the net!!!
The dance ignites the fans, _P0_ celebrates in his own special fashion

event.name: miss
event.commentary: _P0_ fired wide!
_P0_ should have squared the ball went alone and lashed wide
Defender clears
_P0_ curls ball over
Defender back to block just as it seemed to open up
_P0_ smacks into row Z
And the shot creeps just past the post

event.name: save
event.commentary: _P1_'s fingertips flicks it wide
_P1_ forced to tip _P0_'s shot over the crossbar
Great pace shown by _P0_ to get to the ball first but _P1_ produced superb block tackle
Low shot taken well to his left by _P1_
_P1_ makes a superb reflex save to tip wide
_P1_ runs at _P0_ and blocks shot with ankle
Easy save for the goalkeeper
Caught well by _P1_

event.name: start_match
event.commentary: It's a crowd of _AT_ here as the whistle blows
We're under way
The two teams are greeted by a wall of noise as they take to the pitch
The crowd roars as the players run out from the tunnel to start the match
A cloudless day, gives the impression this match is going to sparkle
_AT_ fans can't be wrong, this is the match we have all come to watch
The referee gets the nod from the linesman and we are away
The clash of the titans kicks off
The referees are ready, players set, the battle begins

event.name: half_time
event.commentary: It's half time
It's a _RE_ at half time.
It's a _RE_ at half time, _TL_'s manager has to find something special to spur his team on.
_TL_ heads into the tunnel to await the managers scolding
_TW_ are just 45 minutes away from a stunning victory
_TL_'s manager cops a rollicking from the fans as he turns from the dugout
There are two teams out there and only one of them is playing football

event.name: extra_time
event.commentary: After a close match the game heads into extra time
It's still _RE_: extra time
After _MI_ minutes it's still _RE_: extra time
Who will breakdown first, extra time it is
It's down to determination and fitness now as we head into extra time

event.name: penalties
event.commentary: Who would have thought _MI_ minutes ago it would come down to this
And now we have the tense drama of a penalty shoot out
Two teams, equall till now in every respect,face off in penalties
The teams cant do it so now it's one on one. Striker against goalie

event.name: end_match
event.commentary: The match is over!
_TW_ are triumphant!!!
The fans boo _TL_ off the pitch
After _MI_ minutes the match ends with a _RE_
The referee checks his watch and blows for full time
Well that's that. It ends _RE_
_RE_, what an astonishing result for _TW_

event.name: own_goal
event.commentary: Ohh no, the ball ricocheted off _P0_ into the net
It's a pinball in the penalty box, finally spinning off _P0_ across the line
Oh that's a great shot and it's deflected off _P0_ and into the back of the net
_P0_ passes the ball back to his goalie, oh no the keepers missed it! It's an own goal by _P0_!
That little missunderstanding has cost _T_TT__ a goal

event.name: header
event.commentary: _P1_ chips the ball towards _P0_ who heads the ball towards goal
Diving header by _P0_
He just floated in midair for ages then thunder heads it towards home

event.name: post
event.commentary: Sweet strike by _P0_, hits the post
And the shot glances wide off the post
I'm suprised the post has managed to withstand that cracking shot

event.name: cross_bar
event.commentary: Ball dinked over _P1_ but hit crossbar and bounced to safety
The ball smacks into the crossbar with _P1_ stranded
_P1_ seemed to be everywhere at once, finally tipping the ball off the crossbar

event.name: penalty
event.commentary: _P0_ steps up to take the penalty
_P0_ has a chance to score with a penalty kick
_P0_ has missed a penalty before but he now has a chance to redeem himself
You have to bury the nerves, swallow and concentrate when your taking penalties

event.name: free_kick
event.commentary: Short free-kick from _P0_
_P0_ drives free kick low and hard
_P0_ takes free-kick quickly and curls around wall
_P0_ curls the free kick over the wall
Free kick: _P0_ plays the ball out wide
Free kick: _P0_ hits a long ball up the pitch
Free kick whipped across the face of goal by _P0_

event.name: foul_yellow
event.commentary: _P1_ for dangerous slide tackle on _P0_
_P1_ for foul on _P0_
_P1_ for kicking ball away
_P1_ for time wasting
_P1_ for handball
_P1_ for stopping _P0_ taking a quick free-kick
_P1_ is booked for repeated dissent

event.name: foul_red
event.commentary: _P1_ is reprimanded for high kicking
_P1_ is given his marching orders for contempt
_P1_ for malicious showing of studs
_P1_ for intentional handball
_P1_ is sent off for stopping a clear goal scoring opportunity
_P1_ has been red carded for punching _P0_
_P1_ for swearing at opposition fans

event.name: foul_red_injury
event.commentary: _P1_ fouls and the stretcher bearers come racing on with _P0_ lying in agony on the turf
Foul by _P1_; _P0_ seems to be injured... he might have to be substituted

event.name: send_off
event.commentary: _P0_ has been sent off

event.name: injury
event.commentary: _P0_ will have to go off after what seems an ankle injury
_P0_ looks like he's badly injured

event.name: temp_injury
event.commentary: _P0_ has pulled a muscle but should be able to continue
_P0_ has picked up a slight knock
_P0_ has a large cut above his left eye but it has been patched up and he will be able to continue

event.name: stadium_breakdown
event.commentary: _T0_ is undergoing stadium problems
The floodlights have just gone out

event.name: stadium_riots
event.commentary: The peasants are revolting
And the fans are throwing flares onto the pitch
The riot police have moved in to stop fighting between sets of oppostion supporters
A fan has managed to get onto the pitch and has begun to attack the referee
The fans pour onto the pitch in a full scale pitch invasion

event.name: stadium_fire
event.commentary: Fire consumes _T_TT__'s stadium
Away fans have set fire to the north stand
A flare chucked onto the touchline has started a massive blaze
A speaker has gone up in flames and the blaze spreading around the entire stadium

event.name: substitution
event.commentary: _T_TT__ make a substitution, _P0_ comes on to replace _P1_
_P1_ goes off to applause from the fans, _P0_ replaces him
_P1_ is booed off the pitch as he is replaced by _P0_

event.name: structure_change
event.commentary: _T_TT__ has changed their structure to _EX_

event.name: style_change
event.commentary: _T_TT__ has changed their style to _EX_

event.name: boost_change
event.commentary: _T_TT__ has changed their boost to _EX_
